mapper.select: /* 지출 내역 리스트 조회 */ SELECT spending_group_code AS spendingGroupCode, account_name AS accountName, spending_date AS spendingDate, spending_amount AS spendingAmount, spending_info AS spendingInfo, user_id_code AS userIdCode, spending_reg_date AS spendingRegDate FROM tb_gr_group_monthly_spending;

/* 매출 내역 리스트 조회 */ SELECT gr.sales_group_code AS salesGroupCode, gr.account_name AS accountName, gr.sales_date AS salesDate, gr.sales_amount AS salesAmount, gr.sales_info AS salesInfo, gr.user_id_code AS userIdCode, gr.sales_reg_date AS salesRegDate FROM tb_gr_group_monthly_sales AS gr;

/* 손익 계정과목 리스트 조회 */ SELECT a.account_subject_code AS accountSubjectCode, a.account_name AS accountName, a.profit_loss_classification AS profitLossClassification, a.account_use AS accountUse, a.account_amend AS accountAmend, a.account_reg_date AS accountRegDate, a.user_id_code AS userIdCode, a.account_year AS accountYear FROM tb_a_account_profit_and_loss_management AS a;
